title: aning97
author: aning97
created_time: August 09, 2023, 09:42:16 PMLast edit: September 28, 2023, 11:01:42 PM by aning97
content: STOP"Ignorance makes man blind. Service closed."

comments.author: Stedsm
comments.body: I wonder why anybody who claims leaking signals or trades of some big names, never discusses about our dear brother D Man's BlockchainWhispers paid signals. Can you leak their signals? He's got Mr.P, Mr.W and Mr.M with him and he's the ultimate predictor. Okay don't leak their signals, just leak his report if you can.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Why don't you use the "leaked signals" to make your trading account bigger yourself if they are really accurate, instead of looking for $25 in forums?I mean, if the signals even have an 80% win rate, with good risk management strategy, you can turn $1000 into $300,000 in a few months without having to resell the signals for a mere $25.I can tell you why. The signals are simply fake.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on August 19, 2023, 10:03:42 PMWhy don't you use the "leaked signals" to make your trading account bigger yourself if they are really accurate, instead of looking for $25 in forums?...Obviously, he has already lost his money following these signals and now he needs a new portion of money to continue this exciting activity. Or he thinks that by "selling a shovel" he will get more money than he himself will be able to find gold. But in any case, it all looks unethical: steal and sell for half price.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: aning97 on August 20, 2023, 08:11:07 PMYour messages focused on criticizing others' businesses appear rather uninformed.This is not business, this is thuggery.I have traded long enough to know all about this bullshit and how it works,Quote Have you read about how my signals can make you wealthy in a day? Have you looked at the success rates? NO! Do you understand bankroll management and risk control? Do you know the capital a true trading strategy requires?Funny, because all these questions don't apply to the so-called "leaked" signals you are trying to milk out any cent possible.Quote from: aning97 on August 20, 2023, 08:11:07 PMI MERELY CREATED A POST IN WHICH I WROTE about leaking the best and highest-paid trading signals, and within the platform, with a $25 monthly fee, you get content worth over eight thousand euros.In my opinion, this seems like a nonsensical discussion meant to fill a post. It's not because I lack a rank in this forum that I'm unintelligent or anything else.You could as well come up with "leaked" fixed matches, why not?We have stupid traders here who don't know how to trade and do TA just like our beloved gamblers

comments.author: worldofcoins
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on August 19, 2023, 10:03:42 PMWhy don't you use the "leaked signals" to make your trading account bigger yourself if they are really accurate, instead of looking for $25 in forums?I mean, if the signals even have an 80% win rate, with good risk management strategy, you can turn $1000 into $300,000 in a few months without having to resell the signals for a mere $25.I can tell you why. The signals are simply fake.We all need to learn from this

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: The title could be changed to "THE MOST FUCKING SIGNAL SERVICE" instead of "LEAKING." I'm curious why you haven't considered capitalizing on this privately rather than sharing it publicly. You could secure a loan or sell your property to invest with confidence, potentially paving the way for significant financial success. This approach might be more lucrative than selling signals for a small amount.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.created_time: September 26, 2023, 09:45:26 PMLast edit: September 26, 2023, 10:26:25 PM by wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: I understand the leaked signals are gotten from professional traders whom you've subscribed to, to achieve these signals but I also can say, without doubt, that they had no idea the signals will be leaked and even if they did, they won't permit it without some degree of royalty either in an mou or something. I consider it illegal to subscribe to such as I'll not be happy if someone did same to my business.
